name: A Thousand Words
description:
After not hearing from him in years, your old buddy from college calls you and asks if you want to visit his place like you talked about way back then, his art has been part of the lucky bunch to be featured in many art museums across the country, so you decide to visit him to see the art he has not sold off yet, never seen by the public, oh and he's also offered to make dinner too! What a nice guy...

I recommend however that you remember the date of your visit:

10/19/2021

After all, you might want to keep track of your visits...
